snippet: A House panel faulted risk oversight by some ratings agencies and MF Global's chief risk officer for the firm's demise.
abstract: A House panel faulted risk oversight by some ratings agencies and MF Global's chief risk officer for the firm's demise.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and AZAM AHMED

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON - Congress delved deeper into the downfall of MF Global on Thursday, accusing the rating agencies and one of the firm's chief risk officers of failing to sound alarms.

headline.main: Lax Oversight Blamed in Demise of MF Global
